summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of DB Graph visualization app completed successfully. All major features are working correctly including node display, JOIN colors, pathfinding, settings panel, and theme switching.
passed_tests: Application loads successfully with React Flow canvas
Nodes display alias + ID correctly (e.g., 'Cte__FiscalDocType #338')
Original names shown under aliases (e.g., 'Loc__Country' under 'País')
Different colors for JOIN types: LEFT JOIN=blue, INNER JOIN=green, RIGHT JOIN=purple
Color legend visible in sidebar showing JOIN type colors
JOIN type labels displayed on edges
'Trobar camí' button activates pathfinding mode successfully
Pathfinding between Cte__FiscalDocType (#338) and Reserva (#500) works correctly
Path highlighting shows all 5 nodes with green borders
Start/End node badges display 'INICI' and 'FI' correctly
Settings modal opens with gear icon button
Settings has 3 tabs: Visualització, Colors, Disseny
'Mostrar ID' toggle works correctly
'Mostrar nom original' toggle functions properly
Theme selector (Fosc/Clar) changes theme successfully
Layout direction options available
Color pickers for JOIN types accessible
Node size options functional
Edge styling options available
Main theme toggle button works
Settings persist in localStorage
React Flow controls (zoom, pan, minimap) work properly
All 5 imported views visible: Botiga, País, Cte__FiscalDocType, Hotel, Reserva
All 4 relationships with correct JOIN types displayed
success_percentage: frontend: 100% - All tested features working correctly
